# heightInPixels

**Instance Property**

The height of the display, in pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
var heightInPixels: Int { get set }
```

## Configuring the display properties

- **widthInPixels**: The width of the display, in pixels.
- **pixelsPerInch**: The pixel density in pixels per inch.
